description.en: JoyID is a pioneering universal account protocol that redefines crypto wallet experience through simplicity, security, and usability, designed to accelerate Web3 mass adoption. Built on the robust FIDO WebAuthn standard and integrated with the Nervos CKB blockchain, JoyID eliminates traditional barriers of password and mnemonic management, providing a seamless, passwordless, seedless wallet solution. It supports a wide range of major blockchains including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and more, enabling users to manage diverse digital assets in a single intuitive interface.
description.ch: JoyID 是一个开创性的通用账户协议，通过简单、安全和易用性重新定义加密钱包体验，旨在加速 Web3 的大规模采用。基于强大的 FIDO WebAuthn 标准并与 Nervos CKB 区块链集成，JoyID 消除了密码和助记词管理的传统障碍，提供无缝、无密码、无种子短语的钱包解决方案。它支持包括比特币、以太坊、Solana 等在内的广泛主要区块链，使用户能够在单一直观界面中管理多样化的数字资产。

description.en: Supports secure, user-friendly authentication via Face ID, Touch ID, or passkeys
description.ch: 支持通过 Face ID、Touch ID 或通行密钥进行安全、用户友好的身份验证

description.en: Syncs effortlessly across devices for a consistent, hassle-free experience
description.ch: 在设备间轻松同步，提供一致、无忧的体验

description.en: Simplifies wallet access using FIDO WebAuthn, eliminating complex passwords and seed phrases
description.ch: 使用 FIDO WebAuthn 简化钱包访问，消除复杂的密码和种子短语

desc.en: A quantum-resistant wallet built on Nervos CKB.
desc.ch: 基于 Nervos CKB 构建的抗量子钱包。

q.en: Is JoyID suitable for Web2 users new to cryptocurrency?
q.ch: JoyID 适合刚接触加密货币的 Web2 用户吗？

a.en: Absolutely. JoyID's passwordless, biometric-based login and user-friendly design enable Web2 users to easily transition to Web3 without needing to understand the technical knowledge of seed phrases or private keys.
a.ch: 绝对适合。JoyID 的无密码、基于生物识别的登录和用户友好的设计使 Web2 用户能够轻松过渡到 Web3，无需了解种子短语或私钥的技术知识。

q.en: Do I need to remember seed phrases with JoyID?
q.ch: 使用 JoyID 需要记住种子短语吗？

a.en: No, JoyID eliminates the need for seed phrases, using secure biometric authentication and WebAuthn to simplify and enhance wallet access.
a.ch: 不需要，JoyID 消除了对种子短语的需求，使用安全的生物识别认证和 WebAuthn 来简化和增强钱包访问。

q.en: Can I use JoyID on multiple devices?
q.ch: 我可以在多个设备上使用 JoyID 吗？

a.en: Yes, JoyID provides multi-device support, allowing you to securely sync wallets across devices for a consistent and convenient experience.
a.ch: 可以，JoyID 提供多设备支持，允许您在设备间安全同步钱包，获得一致且便捷的体验。
